subject: Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The All-Star DeLisha Milton-Jones returned to the Los Angeles Sparks in a trade with the Washington Mystics for Taj McWilliams-Franklin and the Sparks’ 2009 first-round draft pick. Milton-Jones played six seasons in Los Angeles, helping the team win W.N.B.A. championships in 2001 and 2002. She was traded to Washington in 2005 and averaged 13.4 points and 6.4 rebounds last season for the Mystics.
